Title: Here come the e-bikes using DJI’s excellent Avinox drive system
Description:
Bosch should be worried after several bicycle brands just announced their first e-bikes built on top of DJI’s compact and lightweight Avinox drive system, which is surprisingly powerful and torquey.
These international brands include Forbidden, Unno, Smartmot…

Title: 'Mum was gagged, handcuffed and bludgeoned to death'

Title: Jury awards $1.68 billion to women who accused director Toback of sexual abuse
Description: Toback, who wrote Bugsy, faces one of the largest #MeToo verdicts in history after a New York jury ordered him to pay 1.68 billion in damages to 40 women.

Title: I was widowed at 36 with four kids. I've found new love, and my partner helps me honor my husband's life.
Description:
Mindy Rouse's husband died when she was 36.
She was left to parent their four children alone.
A year after his death she started dating again.

Title: Hard hit by tariffs, Americans are turning to Goodwill and eBay
